original_title: UNP holds Ratmalana Bala Mandala meeting
original_body_lines: Senior Presidential Advisor and UNP National Organizer Sagala Ratnayake presents letters of appointment to members of the party’s Ratmalana Bala Mandalaya during the meeting held with the participation of Mr. Ratnayake, the Party General Secretary and other party seniors. Pix by Pradeep Pathirana
